name: Hello || Привет
description:
"Здравствуйте!"

"Как дела?"

I never really knew what he was saying to me. 

But I always smiled and said hello. 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~CONTROLS~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys - Character Movement

Mouse Click -Navigating through Text
